courses.name: Python Web Development
courses.description: Python Development uses Python, along with Django or Flask for the back end and HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the front end, making it a popular choice for web development due to its versatility and extensive libraries.

courses.name: Data Engineering
courses.description: Data engineering with cloud involves creating and managing data pipelines on platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP to efficiently collect, store, and process data for insights and analytics.

courses.name: DevOps with Cloud
courses.description: DevOps with cloud integrates development and operations using platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP to streamline software delivery, automate infrastructure management, and boost collaboration for faster, agile development.

courses.name: VMWare and WIntel Administrator
courses.description: VMware and Windows Server Administration involves managing virtual machines and Windows Server systems, including provisioning, resource allocation, and maintenance for smooth operation of Windows applications and services.

courses.name: Java Full-stack Development
courses.description: Learn full-stack Java development, including front-end and back-end technologies.

courses.name: Python Full-stack Development
courses.description: Become a Python full-stack developer by mastering both front-end and back-end technologies.

courses.name: Software Testing - Manual and Automation
courses.description: Master both manual and automated testing techniques and tools.

courses.name: AWS
courses.description: Comprehensive training on AWS services and solutions.

courses.name: Azure
courses.description: Learn Microsoft Azure cloud services and architecture.

courses.name: GCP
courses.description: Fundamentals of Google Cloud Platform for cloud solutions.

courses.name: Snowflake
courses.description: Training on Snowflake data warehousing and analytics.

courses.name: Database Development
courses.description: Design and development of databases with modern techniques.

courses.name: Cloud Administration
courses.description: Administering and managing cloud environments effectively.

courses.name: Windows and VMware Administration
courses.description: Managing Windows and VMware systems for optimal performance.

courses.name: Business Analyst
